meanings.definition: Having a circular shape or form.
meanings.sent1: The ball was the roundest object in the room.
meanings.sent2: The moon is one of the roundest objects in the night sky.
meanings.sent3: The roundest cookie was quickly snatched up by the hungry child.
meanings.sent4: Her face lit up with the roundest smile when she saw her surprise.
meanings.sent5: The roundest table in the house was perfect for family gatherings.

meanings.definition: Being the most round in shape.
meanings.sent1: The roundest apple in the basket looked the juiciest.
meanings.sent2: The Earth is considered the roundest planet in our solar system.
meanings.sent3: The roundest pancake on the plate disappeared first during breakfast.
meanings.sent4: His voice had the roundest tone, soothing everyone who listened.
meanings.sent5: The roundest cloud in the sky resembled a fluffy cotton ball.
